Music Services

Performance Bookings

Available for live performances at venues, private events, and special occasions. My repertoire includes classical, jazz, and contemporary pieces.

Music Lessons

Offering personalized music instruction for students of all ages and skill levels. Lessons are available both in-person (Philadelphia area) and online.

Lesson Information

  • 30, 45, or 60-minute sessions
  • Flexible scheduling options
  • Customized curriculum based on your goals
  • All skill levels welcome from beginner to advanced

Music Services Rates

Performance Bookings

Rates vary based on:

  • Travel distance and location
  • Duration of performance
  • Equipment/accompaniment needs
  • Type of event and repertoire

Please contact me with event details for a personalized quote.

Music Lessons

Base rates (subject to adjustment):

  • 30-minute lesson: $50-65
  • 45-minute lesson: $65-80
  • 60-minute lesson: $80-100

Final rates depend on location, frequency, and specific needs such as equipment and accompanist. Package discounts available.

Book a Service

Available for Local Philadelphia Services

Having called Philadelphia home since 2017, I'm available for in-person consultations, meetings, and collaborations with businesses and organizations throughout the Greater Philadelphia area.

Whether you're based in Center City, the surrounding neighborhoods, or the broader metropolitan area, I can provide hands-on assistance with your technology needs while maintaining the convenience of face-to-face interaction.

Frequently Asked Questions

What types of projects do you work on?

I specialize in web applications, cloud solutions, and AI integrations. My experience ranges from small business websites to complex enterprise applications. Visit my Projects page to see examples of my work.

What are your rates?

Rates vary depending on project complexity, timeline, and scope. I offer competitive pricing and am happy to discuss budget constraints to find a solution that works for your needs.

Are you available for remote work?

Yes, I work remotely with clients worldwide. I'm comfortable with various collaboration tools and maintain clear communication throughout projects.

How do we get started on a project?

Fill out the contact form with details about your project. I'll reach out to schedule an initial consultation to discuss your requirements, timeline, and budget. We'll then create a tailored proposal for your project.

Do you offer special rates for Philadelphia-based businesses?

I'm committed to supporting the local Philadelphia tech ecosystem and often provide special considerations for startups and small businesses in the area. Please mention you're a local business when contacting me.

What instruments do you teach?

I offer lessons primarily in voice, piano, and music theory. Contact me for information about other instruments or specialized musical training.

Do you provide equipment for performances?

Equipment requirements vary based on the venue and performance needs. I can bring basic equipment or work with your venue's existing setup. For larger performances, we can discuss equipment rental options during our initial consultation.
